Of Mew and Men
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Library: Fan Fiction, Poetry, Birthday List, Links & Non-Fiction Archive: Poetry: Of Mew and Men
By The ShaMan on Wednesday, December 17, 2003 - 12:38 pm:

MochiMew is shy and sweet,
There is no doubt of that.
Though do not train it for it's speed,
For it is very fat.

MikMew has a hairy face,
Of this you can't deny.
You can't just trade away his love,
Nor purchase, grab, or buy.

HipMew dances all night long,
And causes quite a stir.
At a party, he doesn't even mind
When he gets confetti in his fur.

By The ShaMan on Wednesday, December 17, 2003 - 12:39 pm:
